item.title: RT by @MarinaHyde: I've launched this Twitter account @tomorrowsmps to shed light on Britain's Hidden Elections - party selections of candidates for winnable Westminster seats. Selections are important events, yet often go totally un reported. Let's change that. Please DM me with tip-offs & news
